# subtitle

**Instance Property**

The subtitle of the caption button.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var subtitle: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The subtitle appears below the title of the caption button.

## Configuring the Caption Button

- **contentImage**: The image displayed in the main content view.
- **contentText**: The text displayed in the main content view.
- **title**: The title for the caption button.
